content:
The CARIN Alliance will host a free Virtual Testing Event on November 11th from 10 am – 6 pm ET. The Testing Event will focus on testing the CARIN IG for Blue Button® and the CARIN IG for Digital Insurance Card. We will hold an Information Session to provide an overview of the Testing Event and will answer a number of questions that might be helpful as you prepare. We will announce the date and time of the Information Session very soon.
The Testing Event will be split into a morning and an afternoon session. The CARIN IG for Blue Button® track is scheduled from 10 am – 2 pm ET and the CARIN IG for Digital Insurance Card track is scheduled from 2 pm – 6 pm ET. The Blue Button® track will focus on real-world testing of the IG including Oral and Vision types. We would strongly encourage all implementers who have not previously tested the Oral and Vision claim types to participate.

Please see below for links to register for the two tracks, links to the track pages, and a draft agenda for the day.

CARIN IG for Blue Button® track page here: https://bit.ly/CARINBB4
Please register for the track here: https://bit.ly/CARINBBSignUp4

CARIN IG for Digital Insurance Card track page here: https://bit.ly/CARINDICard4
Please register for the track here: https://bit.ly/CARINDICardSignUp4

Connectathon Zoom for both tracks: https://leavittpartners.zoom.us/j/94569265309?pwd=V0E2YzJnalQxTUJBbGdwVlFhM3ZSQT09
Password: 365068

Draft Track Schedule (All times ET)

Times and sessions are subject to change.
**
CARIN IG for Blue Button® Agenda**

10:00 AM – 10:30 AM Kick Off
10:30 AM – 1:30 PM Client-Server Testing w/ Breakout Rooms
1:30 PM – 2:00 PM Demos/Lessons Learned From Servers & Clients/Client-Server Testing
Wrap-up and Report Out

CARIN IG for Digital Insurance Card
2:00 PM – 2:30 PM Kick Off
2:30 PM – 5:30 PM Client-Server Testing w/ Breakout Rooms
5:30 PM – 6:00 PM Demos/Lessons Learned From Servers & Clients/Client-Server Testing
Wrap-up and Report Out
